control.title: What is EQUELLA?
control.description: EQUELLA is an award–winning Digital Repository that incorporates Learning Objects, Learning Content Management and integrated content authoring. EQUELLA is revolutionising the way institutions search, manage and create content online.
Please ensure you have reviewed the EQUELLA Installation and Administration Guide available from

control.title: Select JDK directory
control.description: It is required that you have installed the Java Development Kit version 8. If this is not installed, please do so now.

control.title: EQUELLA Installation
control.description: Please choose the location where EQUELLA will be installed. Please ensure that the path contains no spaces.

control.title: Type of Database
control.description: Select the database type from the list of currently supported databases.

control.title: Database Server
control.description: Which server is the database running on? If it is not on this machine, enter the hostname or IP address of the server.

control.title: Database Name
control.description: Enter the name of the database you wish to connect to on the server.

control.title: Database Username
control.description: Specify the username that should be used to connect to the database.

control.title: Database Password
control.description: Enter the password for accessing the database with the above username.

control.title: Database Connection Mode
control.description: Choose to connect to the database via SID (Service ID) or via Service name. For a container/pluggable database, choose the Service name option.

control.title: Institution Administration URL
control.description: The URL address of the institution administration web site. Do not enter 'localhost' or '127.0.0.1' for the hostname or IP address unless you are using this installation for testing purposes, and do not wish to access EQUELLA except from this local machine. You can also specify the port (defaults to 80) and web context (defaults to '/').

control.title: Address Binding
control.description: If you have specified an IP address above, do you want EQUELLA to provide its services exclusively on this network interface, or bind its services to all network interfaces on the server?

item.name: Restrict to given IP address (must specify IP address in URL above)

control.title: EQUELLA Manager website
control.description: The EQUELLA Manager is responsible for starting, stopping and upgrading your instance of EQUELLA. Please provide a password to secure this service and remember it for future reference.

control.title: EQUELLA Manager website port
control.description: Please enter a port number for the EQUELLA Manager website. The default port is 3000.

control.title: Use Proxy Server
control.description: If you have a proxy server, you will need to enter the details here. Please select your connection type.

control.title: Proxy Host
control.description: The hostname or IP address of the proxy server.

control.title: Proxy Port
control.description: The port to access the proxy server.

control.title: Proxy Username
control.description: The username to connect to the proxy server. (optional)

control.title: Proxy Password
control.description: The password to connect to the proxy server. (optional)

control.title: Minimum and Maximum Usage
control.description: The minimum and maximum amount of memory used by the EQUELLA server can be configured to work best for your hardware It is recommended that the minimum and maximum values are set to half of the total physical memory. Never specify a memory value greater than the total physical memory as this may cause the system to fail.

control.title: Minimum Memory Usage
control.description: Enter a minimum memory usage size.

control.title: Maximum Memory Usage
control.description: Enter a Maximum memory usage size.

The free third-party product ImageMagick is utilised by EQUELLA for all image processing. EQUELLA requires version 6.4 or greater of ImageMagick to be installed on your system. If you do not have ImageMagick installed, or would like more information about the product, please visit http://www.imagemagick.org

control.title: Directory to ImageMagick Programs
control.description: ImageMagick is comprised of a set of different programs, and EQUELLA needs to know the directory that contains these programs. For example, running 'which convert' on a Unix-like system may return '/usr/bin/convert' so you should enter '/usr/bin'. On a Windows system, you may have installed to 'C:\ImageMagick6.4', then the programs can be found directly inside that path.

Libav is a free, third-party product utilised by EQUELLA to produce thumbnails and previews for video files uploaded to the EQUELLA repository. If you do not have Libav installed, or would like more information about the product, please visit https://libav.org/

control.title: Directory to Libav Programs
control.description: Libav comprises a set of different programs, and EQUELLA needs to know the directory that contains these programs. For example, running 'which avconv' on a Unix-like system may return '/usr/bin/avconv' so you should enter '/usr/bin'. On a Windows system, you may have installed to 'C:/Libav', then the programs can be found somewhere inside that path, such as ‘C:/Libav/usr/bin’.

control.title: Thank You!
control.description: You may now continue to perform the installation process. Please do not stop the installer, even if it appears to have stalled. Some operations can take up to 2 minutes to complete. If you quit now, no changes will be made to your system.
